name: Snake Charmer (DrMoo42)
description:
Gameplay

Made for the 2020 United Game Jam  with the theme of: "Two"

You control TWO characters with TWO different sets of controls

WASD to move the human, The snake periodically aims toward the mouse.

Kill zombies with the snake, get coins with the human, Killing the flying piggy banks will give lots of gold, but is risky since they run away.

Story

World renowned snake charmer Maxwell Slitherson and his giant Burmese python are going for a "walk" when suddenly they are attacked by hordes of Zombies. Desperate to stay alive (and make some cash), Max commands his snake to defend him.

Credits

Created with GameMaker studio 2

Music by Kevin Macleod: https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/?keywords=USUAN1200066&Search=Search

Sound Effects from https://freesound.org

The camera and spawn_off_camera script were adapted from an earlier project
